data.title: U.S. Economic Development Administration
data.text:
Chairman, CEO Revolution

Revolution’s mission is to invest in and mentor high-growth startups focused on disruptive consumer products. Steve’s entrepreneurial career began in 1985 when he co-founded America Online (AOL). Under Steve’s leadership, AOL became the world’s largest and most valuable Internet company. Steve is also Chairman of the Case Foundation, which he established with his wife Jean in 1997. Together the Cases have invested in hundreds of organizations, initiatives and partnerships with a focus on leveraging the Internet and entrepreneurial approaches to strengthen the social sector. He was also the founding chair of the Startup America Partnership.
